  <script>
    const registerForm = document.getElementById('register-form');
    const registerMessage = document.getElementById('register-message');
    const verifyForm = document.getElementById('verify-form');
    const verifyMessage = document.getElementById('verify-message');

    registerForm.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
      registerMessage.textContent = '';
      registerMessage.className = 'mt-2 text-center text-sm';

      const formData = new FormData(registerForm);
      const data = {
        username: formData.get('username').trim(),
        password: formData.get('password'),
        firstName: formData.get('firstName').trim(),
        lastName: formData.get('lastName').trim(),
        phone: formData.get('phone').trim(),
      };

      if (!data.username || !data.password || !data.firstName || !data.lastName || !data.phone) {
        registerMessage.textContent = 'กรุณากรอกข้อมูลให้ครบทุกช่อง';
        registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        return;
      }

      try {
        const res = await fetch('/register', {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
          body: JSON.stringify(data),
        });
        const result = await res.json();
        if (res.ok) {
          registerMessage.textContent = result.message;
          registerMessage.classList.add('text-green-600');
          registerForm.reset();
        } else {
          registerMessage.textContent = result.error || 'เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการสมัครสมาชิก';
          registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        }
      } catch (error) {
        registerMessage.textContent = 'ไม่สามารถเชื่อมต่อกับเซิร์ฟเวอร์ได้';
        registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
      }
    });

    verifyForm.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
      verifyMessage.textContent = '';
      verifyMessage.className = 'mt-2 text-center text-sm';

      const formData = new FormData(verifyForm);
      const data = {
        username: formData.get('username').trim(),
        phone: formData.get('phone').trim(),
        otpCode: formData.get('otpCode').trim(),
        bankAccountName: formData.get('bankAccountName').trim(),
        bankAccountNumber: formData.get('bankAccountNumber').trim(),
      };

      if (
        !data.username ||
        !data.phone ||
        !data.otpCode ||
        !data.bankAccountName ||
        !data.bankAccountNumber
      ) {
        verifyMessage.textContent = 'กรุณากรอกข้อมูลให้ครบทุกช่อง';
        verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        return;
      }

      try {
        const res = await fetch('/verify-otp', {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
          body: JSON.stringify(data),
        });
        const result = await res.json();
        if (res.ok) {
          verifyMessage.textContent = result.message;
          verifyMessage.classList.add('text-green-600');
          verifyForm.reset();
        } else {
          verifyMessage.textContent = result.error || 'เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการยืนยัน OTP';
          verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        }
      } catch (error) {
        verifyMessage.textContent = 'ไม่สามารถเชื่อมต่อกับเซิร์ฟเวอร์ได้';
        verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
      }
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>
### BLACKBOX.AI

Your HTML code for the registration and OTP verification form looks well-structured and utilizes Tailwind CSS for styling. Below are a few suggestions and improvements you might consider:

1. **Accessibility Improvements**: Ensure that all form elements have associated labels for better accessibility. You have done this well, but consider adding `aria-describedby` attributes to provide additional context for screen readers.

2. **Input Validation**: You have included pattern validation for phone numbers and OTP codes. Ensure that the user receives immediate feedback if they enter invalid data. You might want to add `oninvalid` attributes to show custom messages.

3. **Security Considerations**: When handling passwords, ensure that you are using HTTPS to protect user data during transmission. Additionally, consider implementing client-side validation for password strength.

4. **User  Experience**: After successful registration or OTP verification, consider redirecting the user to a different page or providing a clear next step.

5. **Error Handling**: You might want to log errors to a monitoring service for better debugging in production.

6. **Styling Consistency**: Ensure that the colors and styles are consistent throughout the application. You can create a theme or use CSS variables for easier management.

Here’s a slightly modified version of your script section to include some of these suggestions:

  const registerForm = document.getElementById('register-form');
  const registerMessage = document.getElementById('register-message');

  <script>
    const registerForm = document.getElementById('register-form');
    const registerMessage = document.getElementById('register-message');
    const verifyForm = document.getElementById('verify-form');
    const verifyMessage = document.getElementById('verify-message');

    registerForm.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
      registerMessage.textContent = '';
      registerMessage.className = 'mt-2 text-center text-sm';

      const formData = new FormData(registerForm);
      const data = {
        username: formData.get('username').trim(),
        password: formData.get('password'),
        firstName: formData.get('firstName').trim(),
        lastName: formData.get('lastName').trim(),
        phone: formData.get('phone').trim(),
      };

      if (!data.username || !data.password || !data.firstName || !data.lastName || !data.phone) {
        registerMessage.textContent = 'กรุณากรอกข้อมูลให้ครบทุกช่อง';
        registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        return;
      }

      try {
        const res = await fetch('/register', {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
          body: JSON.stringify(data),
        });
        const result = await res.json();
        if (res.ok) {
          registerMessage.textContent = result.message;
          registerMessage.classList.add('text-green-600');
          registerForm.reset();
        } else {
          registerMessage.textContent = result.error || 'เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการสมัครสมาชิก';
          registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        }
      } catch (error) {
        registerMessage.textContent = 'ไม่สามารถเชื่อมต่อกับเซิร์ฟเวอร์ได้';
        registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
      }
    });

    verifyForm.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
      verifyMessage.textContent = '';
      verifyMessage.className = 'mt-2 text-center text-sm';

      const formData = new FormData(verifyForm);
      const data = {
        username: formData.get('username').trim(),
        phone: formData.get('phone').trim(),
        otpCode: formData.get('otpCode').trim(),
        bankAccountName: formData.get('bankAccountName').trim(),
        bankAccountNumber: formData.get('bankAccountNumber').trim(),
      };

      if (
        !data.username ||
        !data.phone ||
        !data.otpCode ||
        !data.bankAccountName ||
        !data.bankAccountNumber
      ) {
        verifyMessage.textContent = 'กรุณากรอกข้อมูลให้ครบทุกช่อง';
        verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        return;
      }

      try {
        const res = await fetch('/verify-otp', {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
          body: JSON.stringify(data),
        });
        const result = await res.json();
        if (res.ok) {
          verifyMessage.textContent = result.message;
          verifyMessage.classList.add('text-green-600');
          verifyForm.reset();
        } else {
          verifyMessage.textContent = result.error || 'เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการยืนยัน OTP';
          verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        }
      } catch (error) {
        verifyMessage.textContent = 'ไม่สามารถเชื่อมต่อกับเซิร์ฟเวอร์ได้';
        verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
      }
    });
  </script>

### BLACKBOX.AI



Your HTML code for the registration and OTP verification form is well-structured and functional. Below are some suggestions for improvement, along with a clean version of your code:

### Suggestions for Improvement

1. **Input Validation**: You have included pattern validation for phone numbers and OTP codes. Consider adding `oninvalid` attributes to show custom messages for invalid inputs.

2. **Security**: Ensure that you are using HTTPS for secure data transmission, especially for sensitive information like passwords.

3. **User Experience**: After successful registration or OTP verification, consider redirecting the user to a different page or providing a clear next step.

4. **Error Handling**: You might want to log errors to a monitoring service for better debugging in production.

5. **Accessibility**: Ensure that all form elements have associated labels for better accessibility. You have done this well, but consider adding `aria-describedby` attributes to provide additional context for screen readers.

6. **Styling Consistency**: Ensure that the colors and styles are consistent throughout the application. You can create a theme or use CSS variables for easier management.

              name="bankAccountNumber"

              placeholder="กรอกเลขที่บัญชีธนาคาร"
            />
          </div>
          <button
            type="submit"
            class="w-full bg-green-600 text-white font-semibold py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-700 transition"
          >
            ยืนยัน OTP
          </button>

  <script>
    const registerForm = document.getElementById('register-form');
    const registerMessage = document.getElementById('register-message');
    const verifyForm = document.getElementById('verify-form');
    const verifyMessage = document.getElementById('verify-message');

    registerForm.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
      registerMessage.textContent = '';
      registerMessage.className = 'mt-2 text-center text-sm';

      const formData = new FormData(registerForm);
      const data = {
        username: formData.get('username').trim(),
        password: formData.get('password'),
        firstName: formData.get('firstName').trim(),
        lastName: formData.get('lastName').trim(),
        phone: formData.get('phone').trim(),
      };

      if (!data.username || !data.password || !data.firstName || !data.lastName || !data.phone) {
        registerMessage.textContent = 'กรุณากรอกข้อมูลให้ครบทุกช่อง';
        registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        return;
      }

      try {
        const res = await fetch('/register', {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
          body: JSON.stringify(data),
        });
        const result = await res.json();
        if (res.ok) {
          registerMessage.textContent = result.message;
          registerMessage.classList.add('text-green-600');
          registerForm.reset();
        } else {
          registerMessage.textContent = result.error || 'เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการสมัครสมาชิก';
          registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        }
      } catch (error) {
        registerMessage.textContent = 'ไม่สามารถเชื่อมต่อกับเซิร์ฟเวอร์ได้';
        registerMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
      }
    });

    verifyForm.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
      verifyMessage.textContent = '';
      verifyMessage.className = 'mt-2 text-center text-sm';

      const formData = new FormData(verifyForm);
      const data = {
        username: formData.get('username').trim(),
        phone: formData.get('phone').trim(),
        otpCode: formData.get('otpCode').trim(),
        bankAccountName: formData.get('bankAccountName').trim(),
        bankAccountNumber: formData.get('bankAccountNumber').trim(),
      };

      if (
        !data.username ||
        !data.phone ||
        !data.otpCode ||
        !data.bankAccountName ||
        !data.bankAccountNumber
      ) {
        verifyMessage.textContent = 'กรุณากรอกข้อมูลให้ครบทุกช่อง';
        verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        return;
      }

      try {
        const res = await fetch('/verify-otp', {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
          body: JSON.stringify(data),
        });
        const result = await res.json();
        if (res.ok) {
          verifyMessage.textContent = result.message;
          verifyMessage.classList.add('text-green-600');
          verifyForm.reset();
        } else {
          verifyMessage.textContent = result.error || 'เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการยืนยัน OTP';
          verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
        }
      } catch (error) {
        verifyMessage.textContent = 'ไม่สามารถเชื่อมต่อกับเซิร์ฟเวอร์ได้';
        verifyMessage.classList.add('text-red-600');
      }
    });
  </script>
</body>

<template>
  <view class="container">
    <view class="banner">สมัคร VIP รับโพยแม่น!</view>

    <view class="section">
      <text class="title">ข่าวบอลสด</text>
      <view v-for="news in newsList" :key="news.title">
        <navigator :url="news.link">{{ news.title }}</navigator>
      </view>
    </view>

    <view class="section">
      <text class="title">คู่แนะนำวันนี้</text>
      <view v-for="match in vipMatches" :key="match.teams">
        <view>{{ match.teams }} - {{ match.confidence }}%</view>
      </view>
    </view>

    <view class="section">
      <text class="title">ดูบอลสด</text>
      <view v-for="stream in streams" :key="stream.teams">
        <navigator :url="stream.live_url">{{ stream.teams }} ({{ stream.time }})</navigator>
      </view>
    </view>
  </view>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      newsList: [],
      vipMatches: [],
      streams: []
    }
  },
  async mounted() {
    const [news, vip, live] = await Promise.all([
      uni.request({ url: "https://your-api.com/news" }),
      uni.request({ url: "https://your-api.com/vip-matches" }),
      uni.request({ url: "https://your-api.com/live-matches" }),
    ])
    this.newsList = news.data.results
    this.vipMatches = vip.data.matches
    this.streams = live.data.matches
  }
}
</script>
### BLACKBOX.AI



It seems you are trying to implement a Vue.js component that fetches and displays live sports news, recommended matches, and live streams. However, you encountered a `404 Client Error: Not Found` when trying to access the API endpoints.

### Suggestions to Resolve the Issue

1. **Check API URLs**: Ensure that the URLs you are using in the `uni.request` calls are correct and accessible. The error indicates that the endpoint `https://your-api.com/news` does not exist. You may need to replace `your-api.com` with the actual domain of your API.

2. **API Availability**: Verify that the API server is running and that the endpoints are correctly set up to handle requests. You can test the URLs in a browser or using tools like Postman.

3. **Error Handling**: Implement error handling in your API requests to provide feedback if the requests fail. You can log the error or display a message to the user.

4. **CORS Issues**: If you are accessing the API from a different domain, ensure that the server has CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) enabled to allow requests from your frontend application.

### Example Code with Error Handling

Here’s an updated version of your Vue.js component with added error handling:

```vue
<template>
  <view class="container">
    <view class="banner">สมัคร VIP รับโพยแม่น!</view>

    <view class="section">
      <text class="title">ข่าวบอลสด</text>
      <view v-for="news in newsList" :key="news.title">
        <navigator :url="news.link">{{ news.title }}</navigator>
      </view>
    </view>

    <view class="section">
      <text class="title">คู่แนะนำวันนี้</text>
      <view v-for="match in vipMatches" :key="match.teams">
        <view>{{ match.teams }} - {{ match.confidence }}%</view>
      </view>
    </view>

    <view class="section">
      <text class="title">ดูบอลสด</text>
      <view v-for="stream in streams" :key="stream.teams">
        <navigator :url="stream.live_url">{{ stream.teams }} ({{ stream.time }})</navigator>
      </view>
    </view>
  </view>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      newsList: [],
      vipMatches: [],
      streams: [],
      errorMessage: ''
    }
  },
  async mounted() {
    try {
      const [news, vip, live] = await Promise.all([
        uni.request({ url: "https://your-api.com/news" }),
        uni.request({ url: "https://your-api.com/vip-matches" }),
        uni.request({ url: "https://your-api.com/live-matches" }),
      ]);
      this.newsList = news.data.results;
      this.vipMatches = vip.data.matches;
      this.streams = live.data.matches;
    } catch (error) {
      this.errorMessage = 'ไม่สามารถโหลดข้อมูลได้: ' + error.message;
      console.error(error);
    }
  }
}
</script>
```

### Key Changes

- **Error Handling**: Added a `try-catch` block around the API requests to catch any errors and set an error message.
- **Error Message Display**: You can display the `errorMessage` in your template if needed.

Make sure to replace the placeholder URLs with the actual API endpoints you intend to use.

// 根据状态获取样式类
const getStatusClass = (status: string) => {
switch (status) {
case 'สำเร็จ':
return 'status-success';
case 'กำลังวิเคราะห์':
return 'status-pending';
case 'ล้มเหลว':
return 'status-failed';
default:
return '';
}
};

### BLACKBOX.AI

Your Vue.js component for the "SportAnalytics" app looks well-structured and comprehensive. It includes various sections such as a header, a banner, popular packages, latest analyses, news and tips, quick features, and a bottom navigation bar. Below are some suggestions and improvements to enhance your code:

### Suggestions for Improvement

1. **Accessibility**: Ensure that all interactive elements (like buttons and links) are accessible. Consider adding `aria-labels` or roles where necessary.

2. **Error Handling**: If you are fetching data from an API, consider adding error handling to manage any potential issues with data retrieval.

3. **Loading States**: Implement loading states to inform users when data is being fetched, especially for sections that rely on API calls.

4. **Dynamic Navigation**: Instead of hardcoding URLs in the navigation, consider using Vue Router for better navigation management within your app.

5. **Code Organization**: If the component grows larger, consider breaking it down into smaller components for better maintainability.

6. **Styling Consistency**: Ensure that the styles are consistent across different sections. You might want to use CSS variables for colors and fonts to maintain consistency.

### Example Code with Improvements

Here’s an updated version of your component with some of these suggestions incorporated:

```vue

  <view class="container">
    <!-- Header Area -->

        <view class="notification-badge" v-if="hasNotifications"></view>
      </view>
    </view>

    <!-- Main Content Area -->
    <scroll-view scroll-y class="content-area">
